statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); git_info=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null | sed 's/^/ (/; s/$/)/' || echo ''); printf "%s@%s:%s%s" "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$git_info"
